about: ISEB certified, experienced web, mobile and api software testing professional with more than 6 years’ of experience in manual and automation testing. Proven achievement in bringing projects to completion ahead of schedule spread across diverse industries, ranging from Finance to Media. Exceptional communication skills as a teacher and mentor to junior engineering trainees. ISEB certified, experienced web, mobile and api software testing professional with more than 6 years’ of experience in manual and automation testing. Proven achievement in bringing projects to completion ahead of schedule spread across diverse industries, ranging from Finance to Media. Exceptional communication skills as a teacher and mentor to junior engineering trainees.

employments.title: Junior React Developer
key_duties: Creating and maintaining new API, Web UI and Appium frameworks for clients
Designing and writing test automation scripts for API, UI and Mobile
Interviewed, trained and mentored new QA’s
Running automation tests on CI/CD
Increasing in automation test coverage
Integration with other testing applications (AppliTools, BrowserStack and Slack)
Investigating problems in software as a result of testing
Investigating different tools for automation
Migrating Selenium tests to Cypress

employments.title: Software Developer In Test
key_duties: Deputised for team leader in a busy test team of five QA engineering professionals
Created test automation frameworks from scratch
Wrote new Selenium UI tests and API automation tests
Updated Selenium UI tests and API automation tests
Devised new Selenium tests using Appium on iOS and Android
Load testing/ performance testing (Jmeter and Locust)
Integrated Appium with Device Farm
Ran Selenium API and UI tests on CI/CD
Increased in test coverage for automation
Interviewed, trained and mentored new QA’s.

employments.title: Senior Test Analyst
key_duties: Deputising for team leader in busy test team of 4 QA engineering professionals
Creating automation API and UI framework
Assisted, mentored and hired new QA’s
Implemented and managed Quality Assurance process
Evaluated different tools for automation
Continuous Integration through Jenkins
Maintained regression suite
Produce accurate and informative reports for the business
Integration with HMRC and NS&I
Use appropriate measures and KPIs to validate and report on software quality

employments.title: Test Analyst
key_duties: Ensure all delivered features meet and adhere to original specification, customer and company requirements
Maintained regression suite
Review of supplier test scripts and evidence
Create and develop Test Plans
Create and execute SQL scripts used for test validation
Experience working on Front-End and Back-End of software development
Installing and configuring Java/Maven for all QAs to use BDD Framework
Work alongside other test and development team members on automation
Experience of working with globally distributed teams
API testing (manual and automation)
